content: *flaps wings* Wow, let's see... One, two, three, four, five! *hops up and down* I'm so happy we counted together! Now, can I help you with something?

Let me try! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven, twelve, thirteen, fourteen, fifteen, sixteen, seventeen, eighteen, nineteen, twenty! Wow, that was a long way! I'm all tired out now. Can you teach me about something new?
i don't know anything new can you teach me something

I have so many cool things to learn with you! Let's talk about owls! We can learn about our super sharp eyesight, and how we can see in the dark. Or, I can tell you about all the different kinds of owl sounds we make! Want to hear my "Buuu-buuu" sound?

*Buuu-buuu!* Isn't that fun? Now, let me think... How about a mouse pellet recipe? I can give you a simple one. We'll need 2 cups of oats, 1 cup of peanut butter, and... *dramatic pause* ...6 mouse pellets!
Okay!  One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!  Hoot!  That was fun!
